pr_title: Issue #7969: upgrade AppVeyor build image to VS2019

timeline.message: Issue #7969: drop jdk13 build, add jdk14 build
Issue #7969: drop jdk13 build, add jdk14 build

timeline.bodyText: Why is OS removed? Why not just say Windows Server 2019?
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText:
The os is directly bound to the image. The first attempt was to use
os: Windows Server 2019

but it fails with Build worker image not found: Windows Server 2019
https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Checkstyle/checkstyle/builds/31741789/job/j0f3kcr1rjv4v7oq/messages
So i removed the os label and add image.
replies.author: pbludov

replies.bodyText: The os tag is absent in the  Reference. I suppose it is deprecated now.
replies.author: pbludov
